languages.text: The Soldier immediately dashes in the selected direction, spending all their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}. Does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Allows the Soldier to dash through allies and enemies but not through obstacles.
languages.original_text: Солдат немедленно бежит в выбранном направлении и тратит на это все {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}. При этом он не провоцирует {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}. Пробежка возможна через клетки с союзниками и противниками, но сквозь препятствия пробегать нельзя.

traits.locale_text: The Marksman immediately dashes in the selected direction, spending all their movement points. Does not provoke attacks of opportunity. Allows to dash through allies and enemies, but not through obstacles.{br} Once per round.

The Marksman immediately dashes in the selected direction, spending all their movement points. Does not provoke attacks of opportunity. Allows the Marksman to dash through allies and enemies but not through obstacles.{br} Can use once per round.

The Soldier immediately dashes in the selected direction, spending all their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}. Does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Allows the Soldier to dash through allies and enemies but not through obstacles.

The Soldier immediately dashes in the selected direction, spending all their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}. Does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Allows the Soldier to dash through allies and enemies but not through obstacles.

languages.text: Солдат немедленно бежит в выбранном направлении и тратит на это все {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}. При этом он не провоцирует {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}. Пробежка возможна через клетки с союзниками и противниками, но сквозь препятствия пробегать нельзя.
languages.original_text: The Soldier immediately dashes in the selected direction, spending all their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}. Does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Allows the Soldier to dash through allies and enemies but not through obstacles.

traits.locale_text: Стрелок немедленно бежит в выбранном направлении и тратит на это все ОП. При этом он не провоцирует атаки по возможности. Пробежка возможна через клетки с союзниками и противниками, но сквозь препятствия пробегать нельзя.{br} Можно использовать не чаще 1 раза за раунд.

Стрелок немедленно бежит в выбранном направлении и тратит на это все ОП. При этом он не провоцирует атаки по возможности. Пробежка возможна через клетки с союзниками и противниками, но сквозь препятствия пробегать нельзя.{br} Можно использовать не чаще 1 раза за раунд.

languages.text: 士兵立刻朝选定的方向冲刺，消耗所有{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，此次移动不会引发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。士兵可以冲过盟友和敌人，但无法跨越障碍物。
languages.original_text: The Soldier immediately dashes in the selected direction, spending all their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}. Does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Allows the Soldier to dash through allies and enemies but not through obstacles.

traits.locale_text: 士兵立刻朝选定的方向冲刺，消耗所有{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，此次移动不会引发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。士兵可以冲过盟友和敌人，但无法跨越障碍物。

languages.text: El soldado corre inmediatamente en la dirección seleccionada, gastando todos sus {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}puntos de movimiento{/g}. Este movimiento no provoca {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g}. Permite al soldado pasar corriendo a través de aliados y enemigos, pero no atravesar obstáculos.
languages.original_text: The Soldier immediately dashes in the selected direction, spending all their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}. Does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Allows the Soldier to dash through allies and enemies but not through obstacles.

traits.locale_text: El soldado corre inmediatamente en la dirección seleccionada, gastando todos sus {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}puntos de movimiento{/g}. Este movimiento no provoca {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g}. Permite al soldado pasar corriendo a través de aliados y enemigos, pero no atravesar obstáculos.

languages.text: Der Soldat sprintet sofort in die ausgewählte Richtung, wobei sämtliche {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}Bewegungspunkte{/g} verbraucht werden. Verursacht keine {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriffee{/g}. Ermöglicht dem Soldaten, durch Verbündete und Feinde, nicht aber durch Hindernisse zu sprinten.
languages.original_text: The Soldier immediately dashes in the selected direction, spending all their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}. Does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Allows the Soldier to dash through allies and enemies but not through obstacles.

traits.locale_text: Der Scharfschütze sprintet augenblicklich in die ausgewählte Richtung, wobei sämtliche {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}Bewegungspunkte{/g} verbraucht werden. Verursacht keine {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunity}Überraschungsangriffe{/g}. Ermöglicht dem Scharfschützen, durch Verbündete und Feinde zu sprinten, durch Hindernisse dagegen nicht.{br} Kann einmal pro {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} eingesetzt werden.

languages.text: Le soldat s'élance immédiatement dans la direction choisie, en dépensant tous ses {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}points de déplacement{/g}. Ne provoque pas d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g}. Permet au soldat de foncer au travers des alliés et des ennemis, mais pas de traverser des obstacles.
languages.original_text: The Soldier immediately dashes in the selected direction, spending all their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}. Does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Allows the Soldier to dash through allies and enemies but not through obstacles.

traits.locale_text: Le soldat s'élance immédiatement dans la direction choisie, en dépensant tous ses {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}points de déplacement{/g}. Ne provoque pas d'{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaques d'opportunité{/g}. Permet au soldat de foncer au travers des alliés et des ennemis, mais pas de traverser des obstacles.

languages.text: 兵士は選択した方向へ即座にダッシュし、全{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移動ポイント{/g}を消費する。{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}誘発しない。また、味方や敵の間をダッシュできるが、障害物は越えられない。
languages.original_text: The Soldier immediately dashes in the selected direction, spending all their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}. Does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Allows the Soldier to dash through allies and enemies but not through obstacles.

traits.locale_text: 兵士は選択した方向へ即座にダッシュし、全{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移動ポイント{/g}を消費する。{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}誘発しない。また、味方や敵の間をダッシュできるが、障害物は越えられない。

languages.text: Asker anında seçilen yöne doğru atılarak tüm {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}hareket puanını{/g} harcar. {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Fırsat saldırılarını{/g} tetiklemez. Asker, atılarak dost birim ve düşmanları yarıp geçebilse de engelleri aşamaz.
languages.original_text: The Soldier immediately dashes in the selected direction, spending all their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g}. Does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}. Allows the Soldier to dash through allies and enemies but not through obstacles.
